variants.name: python2
variants.description: Enable checking of python 2 type annotations

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-typed-ast
dependencies.description: A fork of Python 2 and 3 ast modules with type comment support.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-mypy-extensions
dependencies.description:
Experimental type system extensions for programs checked with the mypy
typechecker.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependent_to.name: spack
dependent_to.description:
Spack is a multi-platform package manager that builds and installs
multiple versions and configurations of software. It works on Linux,
macOS, and many supercomputers. Spack is non-destructive: installing a
new version of a package does not break existing installations, so many
configurations of the same package can coexist.

dependent_to.name: py-sqlalchemy-stubs
dependent_to.description: Mypy plugin and stubs for SQLAlchemy

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, transforms, and models for geospatial data. TorchGeo
is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, that provides
datasets, transforms, samplers, and pre-trained models specific to
geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-mypy
dependent_to.description: Mypy static type checker plugin for Pytest.
